description:
"I like being the age I am now," Lance explained. "Late twenties."
"Why is that?"
"Because you're still young but you have some experience. It makes things a lot more fun."
"Do you have any regrets?"
"I should have finished college quicker I guess."
"Did you finish?"
"I did," he replied. "Yeah."
"How long did it take?"
"Six years."
Lance works in marketing, but his true love is travel.
"How often do you travel?"
"Pretty much once a month," he said. "I always end up going somewhere."
Lance is straight and single.
"I'll settle down when the time is right," he said. "I just haven't met the right girl!"
title: Lance
